Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.client

Class ClientManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.client.ClientManager
public class ClientManager extends Object
The ClientManager class manages the client-side operations and controllers for the game.

  • Method Details

    • initializeClientManagerSingleton

      public static ClientManager initializeClientManagerSingleton(boolean isCLI, boolean isSocketClient, MyRemoteInterface remoteObject, String ipAddress)
      Initializes the ClientManager singleton instance.
      Parameters:
      isCLI - Flag indicating if the client is using CLI.
      isSocketClient - Flag indicating if the client is using socket-based communication.
      remoteObject - The remote object for RMI-based communication.
      ipAddress - The IP address for RMI-based communication.
      Returns:
      The initialized ClientManager instance.

    • getUserNickname

      public static String getUserNickname()

    • createdControllers

      public static void createdControllers(String ID)
      Creates new instances of controllers based on the received game ID.
      Parameters:
      ID - The game ID.

    • clientReceiveMessage

      public static void clientReceiveMessage(Message receivedMessageDecoded) throws IOException
      Receives a message from the server and dispatches it to the appropriate controllers.
      Parameters:
      receivedMessageDecoded - The received message.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
